## Preparation

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
num_value <- 10
num_ctgry <- 2
ctgry <- rep_len(letters[1:num_ctgry], num_value)
value <- rnorm(num_value)
data <- data.frame(ctgry, value)
datat <- data.table(ctgry, value)
data
```

```{r, engine = 'python'}
import string
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from pandas_ply import install_ply, X, sym_call
install_ply(pd)
```

```{r, engine = 'python'}
num_value = 10
num_ctgry = 2
ctgry = (list(string.ascii_lowercase[:num_ctgry]) * (np.ceil(num_value / float(num_ctgry))))[:num_value]
value = np.random.randn(num_value)
data = pd.DataFrame({"ctgry": ctgry, "value": value})
```


## Solutions


### filter

**R dplyr**
```{r}
out <- data %>%
  filter(ctgry == "a")
out
```

**R data.table**
```{r}
out <- datat[ctgry == "a"]
out
```

**python pandas**
```{r, engine = 'python'}
out = data[data.ctgry == "a"]
out
```

**python pandas ply**
```{r, engine = 'python'}
out = (data
    .ply_where(X.ctgry == "a"))
out
```
